Calculate the binomial series expansion of (10 - 7/y^3)^10.
A. 16777216 x^16 y^8 + 33554432 x^14 y^5 + 29360128 x^12 y^2 + 14680064 x^10/y + 4587520 x^8/y^4 + 917504 x^6/y^7 + 114688 x^4/y^10 + 8192 x^2/y^13 + 256/y^16
B. -8 x^9 + 36 x^8/y^3 - 54 x^7/y^6 + 27 x^6/y^9
C. 10000000000 - 70000000000/y^3 + 220500000000/y^6 - 411600000000/y^9 + 504210000000/y^12 - 423536400000/y^15 + 247062900000/y^18 - 98825160000/y^21 + 25941604500/y^24 - 4035360700/y^27 + 282475249/y^30 #
D. 262144 x^6 y^12 - 1966080 x^5 y^9 + 6144000 x^4 y^6 - 10240000 x^3 y^3 + 9600000 x^2 - 4800000 x/y^3 + 1000000/y^6

Find the sixth term of the binomial series expansion of (9/x - 4/(x^3 y^2))^7.
A. -343/y^6
B. 84000000000/(x^21 y^12)
C. 19840464/(x^11 y^4) #
D. -2025000000/y^13
